code: import React from"react";var Paginator=function Paginator(props){var pageNumbers=[];for(var i=1;i<=Math.ceil(props.totalPosts/props.postsPerPage);i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}return React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement("ul",{className:"pagination"},pageNumbers.map(function(number){return React.createElement("li",{key:number,className:"page-item"},React.createElement("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return props.paginate(number);}},number));})));};export default Paginator;
